question: When is a middleware executed in Django?
Answer 3: Both before and after the view processing
explanation: Middleware in Django is executed both before and after the view processing. It can modify the request before the vi
why_not_a: Middleware is not just before the view; it also processes the response.
why_not_b: Middleware does not run only after the view, it runs both before and after
why_not_c: Middleware does not run only after the view, it runs both before and after
why_not_d: Middleware does not run only after the view, it runs both before and after
